title: TUTORIAL Miniature fig cane with polymer clay | PDF + video
description:
The price includes a tutorial on creating a miniature fig cane with polymer clay for dollhouses at a scale of 1:12. This tutorial is a PDF file with a description of the necessary materials, a link to the video and text. For your convenience, the video is uploaded to YT and has subtitles in English. An active link to the video is inside the PDF file or via QR code. Please note that the video does not have voice acting!
This tutorial is not suitable for beginners and children, since I skip some basic steps and use sharp objects in my work. The tutorials are designed for miniaturists who want to improve their skills or learn author's tricks.
In this tutorial, I’ll guide you through creating a 1:12 scale miniature fig cane using polymer clay. You’ll learn how to sculpt juicy, realistic fig flesh, how to place the seeds accurately and easily, and how to paint the fig skins to get that natural ripened effect.
Please note: This tutorial focuses on making the fig cane only. Other props and scenery are not included.
TUTORIAL Miniature fig cane with polymer clay includes:
♥ 1 PDF file with description of materials and text in English
♥ A link to a video tutorial with a duration of 17:19 minutes (ENG sub).
Please note that this is not a physical item. You can print the PDF document for convenience and watch the video from any device. You can also translate the subtitles into your preferred language. This tutorial is for personal use only. By purchasing this, you can create miniatures and sell them, but the PDF file and video itself cannot be copied, shared or sold.
